text: CCSS.Math.Content.HSF.TF.A.3 (+) Use special triangles to determine geometrically the values of sine, cosine, tangent for π/3, π/4 and π/6, and use the unit circle to express the values of sine, cosine, and tangent for x , π + x , and 2π - x in terms of their values for x , where x is any real number.
